Song.title: Grace Alone
Song.copyright: Dustin Kensrue © 2013 Dead Bird Theology (Admin. by Music Services, Inc.) It's All About Jesus Music (Admin. by Music Services, Inc.)

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [| G | G | C | C | G | G | C | C |]
Verse 1: [G]I was an orphan, lost at the fall; Ru[C]nning away when I’d hear you call, [G] But Father, you worked your will. [C] [G]I had no righteousness of my own; I h[C]ad no right to draw near your throne, [G] But Father, you loved me still. [C]
Chorus 1: And in [D]love, before you l[Em]aid the world’s found[C]ation, You pred[D]estined to a[Em]dopt me as your [C]own. You have [D]raised me up so [Em]high above my s[C]tation; I’m a c[D]hild of God by g[Em]race, and grace a[C]lone.
Interlude: [| G | G | C | C | G | G | C | C |]
Verse 2: [G]You left your home to seek out the lost; You [C]knew the great and terrible cost [G] But Jesus, your face was set. [C] [G]I worked my fingers down to the bone; N[C]othing I did could ever atone, [G] But Jesus, you paid my debt. [C]
Chorus 2: By your b[D]lood I have re[Em]demption and salv[C]ation. Lord you [D]died that I might r[Em]eap what you have s[C]own, And you r[D]ose that I might [Em]be a new cre[C]ation. I am b[D]orn again by [Em]grace, and grace a[C]lone.
{new_page} Bridge: [G/B]I was darkness all of my life, [C]I never knew the day from the night, [D] But Spirit, you [G/B]made me s[C]ee. [G/B]I swore I knew the way on my own; [C]Head full of rocks, a heart made of stone [D] But Spirit, you [G/B]moved in [C]me.
Chorus 3: And at your t[G]ouch my sleeping spirit was awa[C]kened; On my [Em]darkened heart the light of Christ has sh[C]one. Called in[G]to a kingdom [Am]that cannot sh[C]aken; Heaven’s [Em]citizen by g[D]race, and grace alon[C]e.
Tag: So I’ll s[D]tand in faith by gr[Em]ace, and grace alo[C]ne I will [D]run the race by gr[Em]ace, and grace alo[C]ne I will s[D]lay my sin by gr[Em]ace, and grace alo[C]ne I will r[D]each the end by gr[Em]ace, and grace alo[C]ne
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 i was an orphan lost at the fall running away when id hear you call but father you worked your will i had no righteousness of my own i had no right to draw near your throne but father you loved me still chorus 1 and in love before you laid the worlds foundation you predestined to adopt me as your own you have raised me up so high above my station im a child of god by grace and grace alone interlude verse 2 you left your home to seek out the lost you knew the great and terrible cost but jesus your face was set i worked my fingers down to the bone nothing i did could ever atone but jesus you paid my debt chorus 2 by your blood i have redemption and salvation lord you died that i might reap what you have sown and you rose that i might be a new creation i am born again by grace and grace alone bridge i was darkness all of my life i never knew the day from the night but spirit you made me see i swore i knew the way on my own head full of rocks a heart made of stone but spirit you moved in me chorus 3 and at your touch my sleeping spirit was awakened on my darkened heart the light of christ has shone called into a kingdom that cannot shaken heavens citizen by grace and grace alone tag so ill stand in faith by grace and grace alone i will run the race by grace and grace alone i will slay my sin by grace and grace alone i will reach the end by grace and grace alone
